Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai, you'll be centrally located in Dubai, convenient to Safa Park and Burj Khalifa. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Souk al Bahar and The Dubai Fountain.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 804 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This Art Deco hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 5 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has 55468 square feet (5155 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 5 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This Art Deco hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 804 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

With a stay at JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai, you'll be centrally located in Dubai, convenient to Safa Park and Burj Khalifa. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Souk al Bahar and The Dubai Fountain.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Safa Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Souk al Bahar - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Burj Khalifa - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
The Dubai Fountain - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Jumeirah Archaeological Site - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Oasis Centre Mall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
KidZania - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Jumeira Beach and Park - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Dubai Mall - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Majlis Ghorfat Um-al-Sheef - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Dubai International Art Centre - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Mercato Shopping Mall - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Dubai International Financial Centre - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Dubai Zoo - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 11.8 km / 7.4 mi

The preferred airport for JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 Onward. No show and early checkout will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Essential Information:
Please note: Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee applies from 31.03.14 to be paid by the guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment. For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: There is a Tourism Tax payable by the guest directly at the hotel. Prices are based on single or double occupancy. You may incur additional charges at the time of check-in for additional room occupants as well as the Resort Fees and taxes applied on the additional occupants charges.
